website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive ladder ball set that consists of PVC materials for easy assembly.
pros: Includes all parts you need to start playing immediately
Includes carrying case for easy transporting
cons: Colors on the bolas may fade over time

customer_reviews.title: Great value ladder ball set
customer_reviews.text: As usual, AmazonBasics has created a great value ladder ball set. I got a cheap set and it broke almost immediately with the first play. This set while not expensive has thicker PVC tubes and will last longer. It comes with a carrying case. Overall highly recommend for backyard use and tailgating!
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful....
customer_reviews.text: First time using the product we went to the beach and the balls kept coming off of the strings, and it was sort of dangerous when playing because we almost hit a couple people in the head with them when it broke. It was easy to assemble and the carrying case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy entertainment for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Fun and would recommend. One of the balls came untied within the first 20 minutes of use but it was easily tied back on and haven’t had another issue. Great for all ages. It is cheap but it’s sturdy and doesn’t tip or fall over with use. Lightweight and easy to put together. We don’t use the carring case, we just left assembled with the balls wrapped around it and store in my garage rafters. Any time we want to use them we just simply pull them down and their ready to go. Can’t beat the price and everyone has fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: We love ladder golf, unfortunately this set is pretty cheaply made and falls apart pretty easily. I'd look into a different set personally.
customer_reviews.author: Max Haake

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived a day early and had everything in the package that was supposed to be there. That is a bonus for Amazon Prime these days. The quality and weight of this set is a little better than your basic set bought at Wal-Mart or Target. The cords for the bolos are a little longer than regulation but that is better than being too short. You can always shorten the rope but you can't lengthen it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: VERY hard to take down. PVC sticks together very, very tightly. Cheaper just to make your own.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family BBQ and was not disappointed. The set was easy to put together, and once assembled, was very sturdy. I was surprised, the bolas were actual golf balls. I keep them outside year round, and the only issue I have had is that the color on the plastic fades after a summer in the Florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: Inver Brass

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to occupy family and seen this game that had pretty good reviews. I didn't have very high expections. Turns out to be a hit. We set up tournaments to play. Everyone loved it. Can't wait for another gathering to have more tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: robojet

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 piece of pvc. Could repair on my own since I have piping
customer_reviews.text: Missing 1 piece of pvc. Could repair on my own since I have piping. Quality of items good, but couldn’t get kit together to play on my big block party. Amazons Basics were missing a part.
customer_reviews.author: Hurry Hurry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the most heavy duty thing out there, but it worked great. It was easy to assemble, but a little harder to dis-assemble because the pipes tended to get a tight pressure fit. We weren't real rough with this thing, and it held up great. If you're expecting a storm I would bring it inside or put by house and weigh it down with something. This was used for a couple weeks on a drunken cabin trip and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set up recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Great game for kids and adults. Easy set up and tear down. Would recommend a small rubber mallet. Easily Will fit in the travel bag it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: John Lages

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had so much fun with this! It holds up really well because the bottom is a complete square so it doesn’t fall over like others I’ve had in the past
customer_reviews.author: Paige G.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, entertains kids outdoors for ages
customer_reviews.text: My camp kids are obsessed with it. Even convinced some parents to buy it after watching their kids enjoy it so much! Durable, and the bag is perfect for camp use.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to put together and fun to play with your kids or your other half. I still need to play it while drinking because it seems it’ll be fun that way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The balls fall off the strings after several uses!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ladder ball set! My only complaint (and it's a big one) is that the balls tear off the strings after several uses! It is REALLY difficult to string them back on! I had to buy some replacement balls for $15! Almost half the price I paid for the whole set! I hope the seller reads this and fixes it! Also send me more balls please! I also with they put the score on the sticks like my other set! Everything else is AWESOME! Super sturdy PVC and assembly and breakdown are a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Our ladder ball set arrived today and we're already having loads of fun. Set up was quick and easy. My 5 year old plays it at her own distance, so it's fun for the entire family. I will update once we play further to detail the longevity and quality of the bolas after repeated use. All in all, great purchase, fast delivery and tons of fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one that disappeared. Easy to put together. My 8yo did most of it herself. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lo82

customer_reviews.title: Camping fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this game for our camping trips. We all have so much fun playing ladder ball. It was so easy to install my 8 year old can do it. We have taken it camping and used it several times. The glue on the balls doesn’t hold for very long but it doesn’t hinder the game at all. Perfect for all ages. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So unsturdy it was completely unusable...returned
customer_reviews.text: This set was easy to assemble, as many have pointed out; however, ours was so incredibly wobbly as to be unusable. There was nearly a foot of sway from vertical on the top bar because of the cumulative slop in each of the connections from bottom to top. Others reported solid construction, which leads me to think this set is a crap shoot. Who knows, maybe yours will be solid. Ours definitely wasn't...returned.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Judd

customer_reviews.title: good product, the case for it ripped easily
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with this game. It is made of decent enough quality materials to last for a season or two at least.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. Easy to assemble, nice carrying case...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing wrong with it! I say easy to assemble, but you will have to push PVC pipes into pipe elbows. It's not difficult, but will require some degree of force as this isn't medical equipment. I also say sturdy and durable, but if someone steps on it or falls on it, it will probably break. About as good as other sets I've seen, but cheaper than many and the carrying case into which it will probably never be returned is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Valle

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up, easy to store, fun to play! Great set! It is sturdy and can easily be moved around. Good game for all ages - even my 76 year old grandpa could play!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today so I cannot attest to its durability just yet but it’s pvc and the golf balls are solid so as long as you take care of it, this should last a long time. Very easy to set up, and a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: NotArtMjt

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good to Me
customer_reviews.text: Looks great to me! I honestly haven't assembled and played it yet, but it looks like it's made well. And really, how hard can it be to assemble? Oh, and I like that they are real golf balls and not some plastic balls that are garbage. Excited to try it out! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: barbara snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. Thanks AMAZONBASICS!!! I appreciate the products you sell everyday! It's one of my "go-to" brands anymore! This is a great product, easy to put together, easy to take apart. Love the carry case!
customer_reviews.author: addictedtoamazon

customer_reviews.title: Fun times.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game ... kids had a blast playing, which makes it well worth the money spent. I ordered a couple of more outdoor games to keep them busy playing outside vs watching tv inside.
customer_reviews.author: Imran Hameed

customer_reviews.title: This game is a lot of fun with about a 10 min set up time the ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun with about a 10 min set up time the first time. We keep it on the deck but I think traveling with it would be a pain unless you were going somewhere for like a week and could leave it set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Allanna.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. After opening it Christmas Day it was set up and played with and after about an hour someone decided he could make his own set and save his money.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Tennant

customer_reviews.title: It's Ladder Toss
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a 4th of July party. It was played with quite a bit, and wasn't very sturdy, but this did not take away from the game itself. If you're looking to get into professional ladder toss, this set is not for you. But if you're looking for a once or twice a year riot with your family/friends, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luke N

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Great little game. Nicely made, fast to assemble and loads of fun to play. The number one game played on weekends now!
customer_reviews.author: Dewey Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the family’s backyard game collection. Easy for kids and adults to enjoy. Also comes with great bag for taking along on vacations.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Summer activity
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nicely, everything fits in a bag to make it easy to travel with. Easy to put together. Had for a month, sturdy. I’m the type to take it down and put it back in the bag when not in use, so there hasn’t been any damage. I would suggest playing on grass as the string balls will be brushed if not. I did have to tie a knot on one of the strings.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a party I put on. It was difficult but not impossible to put together. I'm not the strongest so I got some help. We only played with it for about a half hour and the ball broke off of the yarn. It was used by adults not children so we were not rough with it. We tried to fix it but decided it wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Portable fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun times! Easy to assemble and disassemble. Portable enough to bring to any outdoor gatherings. Kept adults and kids busy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is durable and has withstood many games with hard throws. It has also withstood being dragged, disassembled, and used for sword fighting by my kids. I was concerned the plastic would not hold up, but it has worked great. This has been fun for my kids and adult friends. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The included carry bag ripped at the seam between the handles before I ever loaded it
customer_reviews.text: While the game came complete, setup easy with the instructions and was enjoyed, when I went to pack up the game after being setup for two days, having never been packed into the included travel bag, I found the top of the bag ripped. The seam had torn while the bag either was in transit or just while sitting. Everything still fit inside, but I have the soft carrying cased now duct taped to try and keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had these guys for just over a year and they have held up great! For the price, you really can’t beat them! The carrying case is awesome, and the balls are real golf balls so they bounce pretty good and can really hurt the shins, if your not paying attention! As long as you put them together sturdy, they won’t normally come apart while playing, but every now and then you may need to push them back together. If you fill the bottom ring with sand or gravel, they stay in place pretty great! Would definitely recommend and have sent many friends to get sets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Had a set from Walmart but couldn’t find it for a picnic so I order this. So much better! My 9-year-old daughter set it up the first time on her own. Very happy we got it. Great carrying case as well.
customer_reviews.author: LWalk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excxellent product. Looks good, and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: anthony a. kordus

customer_reviews.title: it comes in a case that take up little room and is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought this game for our camper, it comes in a case that take up little room and is easy to assemble. Many people played at the last campout and had fun. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to setup. The pole are about as sturdy and durable as you can get without building your own. That being said, it is more where near as good as one built from PC pipes, as these are a thinner plastic. It also has a nice bag to store and carry everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Holman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & durable
customer_reviews.text: This was sturdy compared to a beanbag game we got from Walmart & easier to assemble too. I double checked the knots on the golf balls, because of reviews, but the knots were glued and were sturdy. It held up really well & seems like it will continue to.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: There are big differences between good and bad ones of this game. The previous one I had showed the rope marks on the bar and the bolos tangled all the time. This set does not tangle and after three sessions, there have been no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Best ladder golf set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is solid. We have had other products over the years that are flimsy. I can't imagine a better ladder golf set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for a yard party and it was a huge it. Easy to assemble and stores away in a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made but it did not come with the balls and I have not been able to reach the seller
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Great quality at a reasonable price. I bought these for my son and his friend to use over the summer. Our whole family enjoys this and the quality was much better than I expected. I have taken them apart to bring for tailgating and they are always east’s to set up again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: More durable than expected.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used them a couple of times so far but they seem like good quality in my opinion. It only took a minute to assemble and everything fit as it should. A fun yard game to play with our nieces and nephew!
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Ball broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and all looked good upon assembly. While everything else worked fine. one of the balls split in half during the first game. I am sure it is a fluke, but after going back to my account on Amazon, I can't find any way to get a replacement ball. Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Widdicombe

customer_reviews.title: Ladder toss
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, color coded set. you will definitely enjoy playing! :) Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer fun and great for any age..... set up in yard and had many games..... going on vacation to the beach with us also....great that it has a bag to put it in.....
customer_reviews.author: joyce trice

customer_reviews.title: Broken and easily broken
customer_reviews.text: A few parts were broken and a couple broke when trying to put it together. I'm a woman and dont have much strength, so it's not saying much for the strength of the material. Its Not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Busted case
customer_reviews.text: The game itself looks good but am a little disappointed in that the carrying bag was ripped and zipper teeth broken upon taking it out of box. Feel like we should get a complete product upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Backyard fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter to play with when she visits, which is quite often. We have been enjoying it very much. The stand is plastic and you have to push the parts in so they are really tight but we have had no real issues. It is a fun game and I recommend it for both adults and children!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Kowalsky

customer_reviews.title: do you really need them?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a grad party and they haven't been out since. I would recommend borrowing a set from your neighbors and let them worry about storage :-)
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE ITEM FOR GROUP SETTING!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased tob take camping. Great item! Easy to assemble and disassemble. Made for a great time for all! Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christi G

customer_reviews.title: Quality set
customer_reviews.text: As good as any ladder ball set I’ve seen. Easy to assemble, breaks down small for winter storage. Hasn’t broken yet and it’s seen many drunken 20 somethings abuse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hour of fun
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game keeps up entrained for hours
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Benson

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun and easily portable! The case makes it easy to keep everything organized. Personally, mine is always set up outside. I try to bring them in when it rains, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to assemble! My kids love playing this game! We bring it everywhere we go-Whether it’s to grandmas, parties, camping or the park! Great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Time
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Very easy to assemble and material more robust than it looked online. Time will tell how it lasts but it's family game time fun now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T

customer_reviews.title: We have enjoyed during stay at home
customer_reviews.text: was more useful and fun than expected. easy to put together and enjoyed by all folks. Athletes and non-athletes alike.
customer_reviews.author: mary lau

customer_reviews.title: Love this ladder ball set!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I did some research before purchasing this set and was glad I did. The balls have good weight to them and it was super easy to put together. Perfect summer time activity for bbqs or just family time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bonamico

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily. All parts were included. Can’t speak to the longevity yet but it seems durable and it’s fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Manders78

customer_reviews.title: Ladder ball!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love ladder ball! This works good. Do yourself a favor and order another set of balls. This only comes with 3 each
customer_reviews.author: S. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Portable fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy, functional and fun for kids and adults. Having read reviews on others of these was happy with sturdiness of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Good construction of game and case
customer_reviews.text: Product piping and joints feel and look sturdy. The storage/carry case looks pretty well sewn together and should last with good durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This game is sturdy and well made. So easy to put together - we didn't even use the directions. Looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: apears

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun game
customer_reviews.text: My family has put this game together multiple times to ay and it's always such fun. I'd reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and play esp during covid. Gave us another thing to do as a family outside.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Be careful when windy as this is not as sturdy. Fun game to play in the backyard or at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: This was so simple to put together. I bought this for a middle school carnival and the hard to please teens actually liked it. It endured 3 hours of heavy use and held up well. It was so simple to take down and put back in the bag it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and disassemble. Guests enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for entertaining guests at our parties. Always a hit. Everyone has a lot of fun. Super easy to set up and take apart. Comes with a bag for easy, neat storage.
customer_reviews.author: Gel

customer_reviews.title: Fun game and a good price
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this game comes all ready to be put together at an affordable cost. My family and I have been enjoying playing together
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Brought it to add to the backyard games so the kids don’t get bored during lockdown. Pretty sturdy, a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and disassemble. Love that it has a carrying case making it so much easier to transport. Lightweight. Great outdoor family BBQ game.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it for camping
customer_reviews.text: We play this and cornhole when camping. Games kids and adults can play and enjoy together
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with instructions, so it took about 20 minutes to get it put together, but really fun and easy to play. The whole family enjoys playing, even the two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dombkowski

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and we've already got our money worth! Hours and hours of outside play instead of the kids playing on their tablets! I like how it came with a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easily assembled but falls apart when you move it. I might have to use pvc glue to make more portable
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Fun beach game or anytime
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I absolutely love this game! We take it when we go on a beach vacation too. It can be a little confusing putting it together but not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Danya Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the quality, of this item. The carrying bag is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: coop

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Love the storage bag that comes with the game. Fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Romano

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our backyard family game night! Fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: N Best

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have a score keeper on the side like my old one had. I wish I would’ve realized that before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Myler

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Ladder ball is one of our favorite yard games but we couldn't believe the price on some of the sets in stores. This one is perfect and at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: We all love
customer_reviews.text: We love it and we all have great fun playing with.
customer_reviews.author: iris

customer_reviews.title: OCD
customer_reviews.text: My OCD got the best of me and could not assemble as pictured. A whole day of playing with friends and family and still holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: justpadge

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved the game and I did too since it keep them busy having fun and exercising that was the main reason I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor G

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. But you can’t move them without them coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Ladder ball
customer_reviews.text: The knots in rope are not secure. Golf balls go flying. I Held a flame on all ends to melt rope a bit. This has solved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged. Easy assembly. Some of the joints came apart a little too easily though.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We just used this for the 4th of July and a birthday party. Was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Webber

customer_reviews.title: love this game
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lawn game. Easy to put together and take apart.
customer_reviews.author: jasaroony

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a recent beach trip, 4 kids, it was great. Easy to put together, stayed together, good quality thus far and a nice carrying case as well.
customer_reviews.author: RJ_77

customer_reviews.title: it's very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family BBQ and was not disappointed. The set was easy to put together, and once assembled, was very sturdy. I was surprised, the bolas were actual golf balls. I keep them outside year round, and the only issue I have had is that the color on the plastic fades after a summer in the Florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: korded

customer_reviews.title: Our guests enjoyed playing this game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a BBQ we had last weekend. Our guests enjoyed playing this game. It was easy to set up and I am pleased with the item.
customer_reviews.author: vsr

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great addition to a party
customer_reviews.text: It was great. Easy to assemble and lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: georg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Super fun at family gathering/picnics! Really great for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun, solid set, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself this and have now purchased 2 more sets to give as gifts and both are very happy with this set. Hours of fun to be had!
customer_reviews.author: 4rvwofproduct

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Ladder Toss Outdoor Lawn Game Set with Soft Carrying Case - 40 x 24 Inches, Red and Blue
feature_bullets: Easy-to-learn game offers interactive family fun
Includes 2 upright ladder-shaped targets, 3 blue bolas, and 3 red bolas
PVC pipes create target framework, which measures 40 x 24 inches each
Simple to assemble; lightweight; carry case included for easy transport and storage
Designed for 2 to 4 players; suitable for ages 14 and up; for indoor/outdoor play
